exceptions.tactic: intros f a b c H eps.
intros f' a b c H eps.

original: intros f a b c H eps. apply uniform_continuity_2d_1d with (f := fun x y => f y x) (a := a) (b := b) (c := c). intros y Hy. apply (H y). auto. intros eps' Heps'. destruct (H y (conj Hy1 Hy2) eps') as [d Hd]. exists d. intros x y u v Hx Hy3 Hu Hv. specialize (Hd x v u y Hy3 Hv Hx Hy2). rewrite Rabs_triang. rewrite <- Rabs_Ropp. apply (Rabs_le_between Hd). apply Rabs_le_between with (eps := eps). auto.
